evidence.claim: Climate Alpha utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure services.
The company employs Snowflake for data storage and processing needs.
Apache Kafka is used for real-time data streaming in Climate Alpha's solutions.
Details on Cloud platforms utilized are mentioned in their engineering careers page.
Integration patterns, particularly with data platforms, highlighted in their developer section.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of involvement in healthcare data exchange or X12 transactions found.
